uvi.description:
dm rq: don't queue request to blk-mq during DM suspend

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15 by commit b4459b11e84092658fa195a2587aff3b9637f0e7. For more details please see the references link.
